title: Box
medium: Enamel on copper, with copper-gilt mounts
description: In shape of a Dalmation dog's head with hinged circular cover, thumb-lift of row of graduated beads. Cover slightly domed. Head is painted in naturalistic colors, spotted black on white ground, yellow eyes. Cover coarsely painted with standing Dalmation on paved terrace, trees beyond, surrounded by violet scrolls. Interior is white.
name: Box
